data.title: raja kamran on LinkedIn: Congratulations… vincote team
data.text:
2nd target achieved, our lovely participants in the 2nd course of CQI /IRCA LA ISO 14001 have taken the exam joifully and they will enjoy the weekend while me; preparing for the 3rd CQI /IRCA LA in ISO 45001. One more week to go and can say mission accomplished but the loop never ends to the next mission. God knows where it will be.

Bureau Veritas works with companies in various industries to manage their #ESG roadmaps and monitor the progress of their #sustainability strategies. Today, we meet Mira, a #CSR Manager at a large international ready-to-wear group, who wants to improve her company’s #SupplyChain. To do this, she needs the support of a trusted third party like BV to draft customized action plans and ensure delivery of concrete outcomes. In this seventh episode of our All About Trust #Podcast, let’s see how we support Mira achieve her company’s sustainability goals. https://lnkd.in/eReAD_xR #ShapingaWorldofTrust #BVGreenLine

For the second time in a row, Pakistani scientist Mubashir Husain Rehmani, a graduate of Mehran University of Engineering and Technology’s Department of Computer Systems Engineering’s 1st Batch, has been named to the Top 1% of global scientists. According to Clarivate Web of Science, he got the Highly Cited Researcher award 2021 in the cross-field this time. Dr. Mubashir has been named to the “Global Highly Cited Researchers” list of the world’s most influential scientists for the second time. In the discipline of computer science, he was recognised a Highly Cited Researcher in 2020. #technology #engineering #computerscience #university #science #startuppakistan
